We are writing a paper for CGIV 2004, and I had a quick question:

Has anybody ever combined spectral imagery (environments) with spectrally rendered 3D objects? If yes, also in real time?

Thanks a bunch,
Franz


Franz Herbert, Vice President Research & Development
